blank1_info_sec2 = 1134 Tenjinnakajo Fujkawa-cho Minimikoma-gun, Yamanashi-ken 400-0592 | website = | footnotes = }} Fujikawa is a town in Minamikoma District, Yamanashi, Japan. On March 8, 2010 the towns of Masuho and Kajikazawa combined to become the new town of "Fujikawa". ==Other websites== * Fujikawa official website Category:Towns in Japan Category:Settlements in Yamanashi Prefecture
